appraisal.reason: According to the newsletter, Saturday confessions are scheduled from 10:00–11:00 and 17:00–17:50. The weekday (12:00–12:20) and Sunday (10:00–10:30 and 12:00–12:30) times remain as stated. Please note the Saturday evening session does not extend to 18:00.

According to this newsletter, Confession is Monday to Friday from 12:15pm to 12:40pm, not 12:00pm to 12:40pm. On Saturdays it is from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, not until 6:00pm. There is no Confession listed on Sundays.

According to this newsletter, weekday confessions are Mon–Fri from 5:40 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. Saturday confessions are 11:30 a.m.–12:15 p.m. and 5:00–5:50 p.m., not until 6:00 p.m. There are no scheduled confessions on Sundays.
